Text:
Well I hope you keep uploading them. I definitely do appreciate your work and like you said no one else has been doing them. The series is entertaining so far. They are essentially trying to make modern day jousting a more well known sport.

Thanks for the upload.
I was incorrect on saying no one else has been doing them. Looks like sceneline and tvteam have been uploading them also.
I'm definitely enjoying the show and this is the method I used to watch every week so I do hope you keep it up.  We appreciate the effort.
